document_data.name: Towerfall
document_data.mainbody: '''''Towerfall''''' was a powerful [[arcane]] [[spell]] that could knock over stone towers and walls.
document_data.Effects:
''Towerfall'', quite simply, lifted and knocked over huge stone structures, like castle towers, bridges, and city walls.

A variant of ''towerfall'' was ''[[stone fountain]]''.
document_data.History: [[Inhil Lauthdryn|Inhil "Hurler-of-Stars" Lauthdryn]], the [[Magister]] from [[1282 DR|1282]] to [[1294 DR]], had a special love of blowing up castles, hence his creation of ''towerfall''. He particularly enjoyed the spell, but he took its secrets to his grave in the [[1294 DR|Year of the Deep Moon, 1294 DR]].
